text: Yeroo waan Rabbiin buusetti amanaa isaaniin jedhame "nuti waan nurratti buufametti amanna" jedhuWaan isaan ala jiru odoo inni dhugaa dhugoomsaa waan (kitaaba) isaanii wajjin jiruu ta’ee jiruu itti kafaran(Yaa Muhammad! SAW) jedhi: "Sila yoo dhugaan mu’uminoota taataniif maaliif sana dura nabiyyoota Rabbii ajjeeftu
